scripts.build: sequelize model:generate --name Score --attributes username:string, score:integer && sequelize model:generate --name Player --attributes username:string, isReady:boolean, socketId:string, totalCredits:integer, turnToAct:boolean && sequelize model:generate --name Card --attributes username:string, card:string, value:integer && sequelize model:generate --name Bet --attributes username:string, amount:integer && sequelize db:migrate --env production
